title: Plan V-TV/Episode 129: The Current COVIDtastrophe – Eugenics and Transhumanism, versus #TeamHuman (DR. MARK CRISPIN MILLER)
cleaned_text:
Publisher’s Note: Portions of this Plan V-TV interview may be troubling to some listeners and viewers. Here are some helpful links below, including a deep dive into the history and goals of eugenics and transhumanism,a as well as long-form scholarly researched journalistic docs in this VI post entitled “E Who Must Not Be Named.” Note – Begin with the Center for Disease Control’s own “Vaccine Adverse Events Reporting System” (VAERS), which indicates more than one million US “adverse events” and more than 24,000 US deaths reported post-V.

And below, all the links and references informing our conversation with Dr. Mark Crispin Miller.

In addition, listen to www.Doctors4covidethics.org co-founder Dr. Sucharit Bhakti, co-author of Vermont’s Chelsea Green published book Corona False Alarm, in this new conversation with Children’s Health Defense “Financial Rebellion” co-hosts.

Finally, below. a few telling videos focused on TRANShumanism. Eat the Ie Cream! I’m Trans, Human, that is. Gonna be “Digital.”

Predictive programming, anyone? You be the judge.

Holocaust survivor Vera Sharav explores eugenics, the Spanish Flu “epidemic, the Holocaust, and the current COVIDtastrophe. British funeral director John O’Looney describes the bodies piling up. US pathologist Ryan Cole on COVID autopsies. OneAmerica insurance industry CEO Scott Davidson on the dramatic 40% uptick in US deaths “among working age people.”And finally, former BlackRock Investor Edward Dowd. “Everyone needs to get involved,” states Dowd, who is blowing the whistle on the stupendous financial corruption underlaying the current COVIDtopian Unpleasantness. Dowd’s interview with the High Wire’s Del Bigtree is here.More here re: so-called “vaccine passports” at the indefatigable Celia Farber’s Substack, and Forbes reports on the so-called SMART Health Card (a.k.a. “vaccine passport”) – now in motion in 21 US states, while the do-called “World Health Organization” (WHO?) rumbles about a “Global Vaccine Passport.”

And don’t miss this short video from the Canadian Bankers Association explaining how a Universal Digital Currency will render US slaves to the Transhuman Globalists in the name of “safety,” “convenience”, and “efficiency.” Thanks to Vermonter Piper Stover for sending this over.
